trans-unit.source: Represents the look and feel of a row in a table layout.
trans-unit.target: Representa a aparência de uma linha em um layout de tabela.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle> class represents the user interface (UI) characteristics of a row in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle> classe representa as características de interface de usuário de uma linha em um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>.

trans-unit.source: The styles for all the rows in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> are collected in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.RowStyles%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: Os estilos para todas as linhas em uma <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> são coletados no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.RowStyles%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: This simple class offers the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle.Height%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutStyle.SizeType%2A> for a row.
trans-unit.target: Esta classe simple oferece o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle.Height%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutStyle.SizeType%2A> para uma linha.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to extract a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle> from a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutRowStyleCollection>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como extrair um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle> de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutRowStyleCollection>.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> class.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo de código é parte de um exemplo maior fornecido para a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle" /> class to its default state.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle" /> com seu estado padrão.

trans-unit.source: This constructor sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutStyle.SizeType%2A> property to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SizeType.AutoSize> and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle.Height%2A> property to 0.
trans-unit.target: Esse construtor define o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutStyle.SizeType%2A> propriedade <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SizeType.AutoSize> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle.Height%2A> propriedade como 0.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutStyle.SizeType" /> indicating how the row should be should be sized relative to its containing table.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutStyle.SizeType" /> indicando como a linha deve ser dimensionada em relação à sua tabela recipiente.

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle" /> class using the supplied <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SizeType" /> value.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle" /> usando o valor <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SizeType" /> fornecido.

trans-unit.source: This constructor sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle.Height%2A> property to 0.
trans-unit.target: Esse construtor define o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle.Height%2A> propriedade como 0.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutStyle.SizeType" /> indicating how the row should be should be sized relative to its containing table.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutStyle.SizeType" /> indicando como a linha deve ser dimensionada em relação à sua tabela recipiente.

trans-unit.source: The preferred height in pixels or percentage of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" />, depending on <c>sizeType</c>.
trans-unit.target: A altura preferencial em pixels ou percentual do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" />, dependendo do <c>sizeType</c>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle" /> class using the supplied <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SizeType" /> and height values.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle" /> usando os valores de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SizeType" /> e altura fornecidos.

trans-unit.source: The `height` parameter will take on different meanings depending on the `sizeType` parameter.
trans-unit.target: O `height` parâmetro adotará significados diferentes dependendo do `sizeType` parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle.Height%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte a propriedade <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle.Height%2A>.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="height" /> is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="height" /> é menor que 0.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the height of a row.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a altura de uma linha.

trans-unit.source: The preferred height of a row in pixels or percentage of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" />, depending on the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutStyle.SizeType" /> property.
trans-unit.target: A altura preferencial de uma linha em pixels ou a porcentagem do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" />, dependendo do <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutStyle.SizeType" /> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle.Height%2A> property will take on different meanings depending on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutStyle.SizeType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle.Height%2A> propriedade adotará significados diferentes dependendo do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutStyle.SizeType%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the possible meanings of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle.Height%2A>.
trans-unit.target: A tabela a seguir descreve os possíveis significados dos <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle.Height%2A>.

trans-unit.source: `SizeType` value
trans-unit.target: Valor `SizeType`

trans-unit.source: `Height` interpretation
trans-unit.target: `Height` interpretação

trans-unit.source: The preferred row height in pixels (fractional portion ignored).
trans-unit.target: A altura da linha preferencial em pixels (parte fracionária ignorado).

trans-unit.source: Not applicable—the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle.Height%2A> property is ignored.
trans-unit.target: Não aplicável — o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle.Height%2A> propriedade será ignorada.

trans-unit.source: The preferred row height as a percentage of the containing table.
trans-unit.target: A altura da linha preferencial como uma porcentagem da tabela que contém.

trans-unit.source: The value is less than 0 when setting this property.
trans-unit.target: O valor é menor que 0 ao definir essa propriedade.
